EmailTemplate.subject: Creating a Business Plan workshop with Lloyds Bank - April 8th - BOOK NOW
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
This April, The Challenge Society is teaming up with Business in the Community to provide a series of FREE employability workshops for NCS graduates in North East London, run by leading industry professionals.
On Friday 8th April, from 10:00 - 12:00, we will be Joined by Nicholas Beeson from Lloyds Banking Group for an amazing workshop on how to turn your ideas into a successful business plan!
This workshop will be focusing on:
How can you start a business? What do you need to know to make it a success? What is a business plan? How can you prove that your business idea will work?
Learn from a leading business professional how to get your ideas off the ground and succeed in the world of business from a young age.
This will be an amazing opportunity for anyone who feels they have a business idea worth pursuing.
WHEN
Friday, 8 April 2016 from 10:00 to 12:00 (BST)
WHERE
The Challenge - Courtyard 2, Highgate Studios, 53-79 Highgate Road, London, NW5 1TL, United Kingdom
Space is limited so please book NOW here (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/business-plan-workshop-with-lloyds-banking-group-tickets-24283118461) to ensure your place on this workshop!
N.B. WE HAVE RELEASED A LIMITED NUMBER OF EXTRA TICKETS FOR THE CV & INTERVIEW SKILLS WORKSHOP ON WEDNESDAY 13TH APRIL. CLICK HERE (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/cv-interview-skills-workshop-with-lloyds-banking-group-tickets-24084914628) TO SECURE YOUR TICKET WHILE THEY LAST.
If you have any queries, please reply to this email.
Kind regards,
The Challenge Society
